title: Connexion | Sparkier
description: Validate authentication on Connexion | Sparkier via Connexion, ensuring login works with provided test credentials.
playwrightOutline: // TODO: Provide authentication credentials (e.g., TEST_EMAIL / TEST_PASSWORD) before running this scenario.
const cta = page.getByRole('button', { name: /Continuer avec LinkedIn/i }).or(page.getByRole('link', { name: /Continuer avec LinkedIn/i }));
// Verify navigation after performing the primary action.
await expect(page).toHaveURL(/https://www\.sparkier\.io/terms/); // adjust expected destination if necessary
expectedOutcome: Successful authentication using the provided test account without triggering MFA or lockout.
baselineAssertions: CTA "Continuer avec LinkedIn" is visible and interactive.
Key form fields accept input and validation messages remain clear.
repeatabilityNotes: Use dedicated non-production credentials; ensure account is reset between runs.

title: Sparkier - Boostez votre activité avec les Sparks
description: Navigate through Sparkier - Boostez votre activité avec les Sparks via Sparkier for marketing personas to review frequently asked questions, verifying the content loads and links resolve.
playwrightOutline: await expect(page).toHaveTitle(/Sparkier - Boostez votre activité avec les Sparks/i);
await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { level: 1, name: /Débloquez vos décisions stratégiques en 1h/i })).toBeVisible();
// Verify navigation after performing the primary action.
await expect(page).toHaveURL(/https://www\.sparkier\.io//); // adjust expected destination if necessary
baselineAssertions: Title matches "Sparkier - Boostez votre activité avec les Sparks".
Primary heading displays "Débloquez vos décisions stratégiques en 1h".
repeatabilityNotes: No special setup required; verify target environment stability before regression runs.

title: Sparkier - Créez votre boutique de conseil en ligne | Vendez vos Sparks
description: Exercise the primary CTA on Sparkier - Créez votre boutique de conseil en ligne | Vendez vos Sparks via Vendre avec Sparkier for design personas using the "Commencer" CTA, confirming interactive elements behave as expected.
playwrightOutline: await expect(page).toHaveTitle(/Sparkier - Créez votre boutique de conseil en ligne \| Vendez vos Sparks/i);
await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { level: 1, name: /La boutique du consulting/i })).toBeVisible();
// Verify navigation after performing the primary action.
await expect(page).toHaveURL(/https://www\.sparkier\.io//); // adjust expected destination if necessary
expectedOutcome: Primary interaction completes without errors by activating "Commencer".
baselineAssertions: Title matches "Sparkier - Créez votre boutique de conseil en ligne | Vendez vos Sparks".
Primary heading displays "La boutique du consulting".
Navigation link "Vendre avec Sparkier" remains visible.
repeatabilityNotes: No special setup required; verify target environment stability before regression runs.
